name: Minced Beef with Rice
imgAlt: Cantonese minced beef with egg over rice
instructions: Marinate beef with cornstarch, oyster sauce, white pepper, 2 tbsp water, and 2 tsp oil for 10 minutes.
Mix sauce: combine oyster sauce, light soy sauce, dark soy sauce, cooking wine, and chicken bouillon.
Make slurry by mixing potato starch with water.
Mound hot rice on a plate, make an indent in center, and crack egg into it.
Heat wok on high, add oil, then add beef on low heat. Break apart and cook 1-1.5 minutes.
Add diced green onions and stir-fry 1 minute.
Pour in hot water along edge of wok, add sauce and green peas.
Turn heat to high and cook 30-40 seconds.
Add slurry on medium heat to thicken, then add sesame oil and finishing dark soy sauce.
Ladle minced beef over rice, leaving egg in center exposed, and serve immediately.
